I think a better system will be that you just recolor alot of comp capes and make it so when you use red dye on a comp cape it becomes red.
Thats pretty easy to do

item.title: Completionist cape colors
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I have recently decided to make it so players can choose their own Completionist cape colors. I just need a little help on the command client sided (Will change later). This is what I have for the command:

if(inputString.equals("trimcolor")) { int color = 0; String[] args = inputString.split(" "); color = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); trimColor = title; }
And it isn’t working. I’ve never done client sided commands that requires an input after the command name.

Read full topic
